metadata.title: CVE-2021-25287 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.2.0. There is an out-of-bounds read in J2kDecode, in j2ku_graya_la.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25287` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 8.1.2+dfsg-0.1ubuntu1
python3-pil.imagetk - 8.1.2+dfsg-0.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.1.2+dfsg-0.1ubuntu1').
